sentences.en: Children must not disobey the orders of their father and mother.
sentences.cn: 孩子们不能违抗父母之命.

sentences.en: Condition # 2: After Adam fell, all people are free only disobey God.
sentences.cn: 状况2 ﹕ 亚当堕落之后 ﹐ 全人类都只有不顺服神的自由.

sentences.en: He urged Russian soldiers to disobey orders if asked to fire on civilian targets.
sentences.cn: 他鼓动俄国士兵若被要求向平民开火就抗命不从。

sentences.en: I recommend that you do not disobey your officer.
sentences.cn: 我劝你不要反抗你的长官.

sentences.en: I recommend you not to disobey your officers.
sentences.cn: 我劝你不要不服从你的长官.

sentences.en: I'll learn you how to disobey my orders!
sentences.cn: 我要给你一点厉害看看不服从我的命令会怎么样!

sentences.en: If you disobey the headmaster's instructions, you will be punished.
sentences.cn: 如果你违背校长的指示, 你将受到处罚.

sentences.en: It pains me to have to disobey you, but I must.
sentences.cn: 不得不违抗你使我痛苦, 但我必须那样做.

sentences.en: Jim Walsh: If You disobey the order, you'll endanger your life.
sentences.cn: 吉姆·沃什: 如果你胆敢再违反纪律, 你的生命将会受到威胁.

sentences.en: No Party member is permitted to disobey orders!
sentences.cn: 不许任何人不执行命令!

sentences.en: Once the order is given, who dares to disobey?
sentences.cn: 号令一出, 谁敢不依?

sentences.en: So Jonah made up his mind to disobey God.
sentences.cn: 于是,约拿书决心违抗上帝.

sentences.en: Those who disobey will be severely punished.
Unthinkable to disobey the iron voice from the wall.
sentences.cn: 要想不听从墙上发出来的声音,是不可想象的.

sentences.en: You disobey me, are done . Do you understand me?
sentences.cn: 你敢违抗我的话, 就死定了听懂了 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: to refuse to do what someone with authority tells you to do, or refuse to obey a rule or law
